_sText:
Tried a few different things for my second map so dont expect it to be perfect, still using dev textures because...well I kinda like the theme I made up, but I do plan on making maps with actual themes in the future however I would like to continue the color shade series I got going on here, since its an easy and simple design so I can focus more on Game play.

Any and all critique is welcome and if you have any hint or tips you would like to share I'm more than willing to listen.

Hope you enjoy! =)

edit- I realize adding the second ladder by its self was stupid so I added a small surf so you can keep all of your speed and also added 2 ladder on the side walls
